channel.title: Need Help Fixing NPC NoCliping, iClairity Base
channel.description:
Hey, I need help because whenever a player attacks an NPC on the iclarity base and they teleport away, the NPC will walk like 100 miles until its finds them LOL.
I want this fixed because I'm going to add some bosses on my server and it would be fucked if they all followed players all around the server so please help me.
Ill rep++ for any help at all.
